mapper.insert: insert into t_applications ( form_id, user_id, group_id, place_id, activity_title, activity_content, attendance, start_date, end_date,create_time ) values(#{formId},#{userId},#{groupId},#{palceId}, #{activityTitle},#{activityContent},#{attendance}, #{startDate},#{endDate},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update t_applications set activity_title = #{activityTitle}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, attendance = #{attendance}, place_id = #{placeId}, activity_content = #{activityContent}, update_time = #{updateTime} where form_id = #{formId}
mapper.select: select ta.form_id as formId, ta.user_id as userId, ta.group_id as groupId, ta.place_id as placeId, tu.zn_name as znName, ta.activity_title as activityTitle, DATE_FORMAT(ta.start_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as startDate, DATE_FORMAT(ta.end_date,'%Y-%m-%d') as endDate, ta.verify_status as verifyStatus, ta.is_eff as isEff, ta.is_off as isOff, ta.reviewer as reviewer, DATE_FORMAT(ta.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime, DATE_FORMAT(ta.verify_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as verifyTime from t_applications as ta left join t_user as tu on ta.user_id = tu.user_id left join t_place as tp on ta.place_id = tp.place_id where ta.group_id = #{groupId} and ta.is_eff!=1

select ta.form_id as formId, ta.user_id as userId, ta.group_id as groupId, ta.app_title as appTitle, DATE_FORMAT(ta.start_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as startTime, DATE_FORMAT(ta.end_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as endTime, ta.place_id as placeId, tp.place_name as placeName, ta.attendance as attendance, ta.verify_status as verifyStatus, ta.app_desc as appDesc, DATE_FORMAT(ta.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d') as createTime from t_applications as ta left join t_user as tu on ta.user_id = tu.user_id left join t_place as tp on ta.place_id = tp.place_id where ta.user_id = #{userId} and ta.is_eff!=1

select ta.form_id as formId, ta.user_id as userId, ta.group_id as groupId, ta.place_id as placeId, tu.zn_name as znName, ta.reviewer as reviewer, ta.activity_title as activityTitle, ta.activity_content as activityContent, ta.attendance as attendance, ta.start_date as startDate, ta.end_date as endDate, ta.mail_msg as mailMsg, ta.verify_status as verifyStatus, ta.is_eff as isEff, ta.is_off as isOff, ta.create_time as createTime, ta.update_time as updateTime, ta.verify_time as verifyTime from t_applications as ta left join t_user as tu on ta.user_id = tu.user_id where form_id = #{formId};
